body:
On Darwin (Mojave), a Skylake CPU is misidentified as Broadwell.

Upon investigation of the output of `sysctl -n machdep.cpu.{,leaf7_}features`, it would appear that the `xsavec` and `xsaveopt` features are represented by the single flag `XSAVE`, and `clflushopt` is identified as `CLFSOPT`.
title: Skylake microarchitecture misidentified on Darwin
